Package com.Order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.Order.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order made by a customer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(HashMap<FoodItem,Integer> items, Boolean option)
      Constructs an Order object with the specified items and option.
      Parameters:
      items - A HashMap containing FoodItem objects as keys and their corresponding quantities as values.
      option - A Boolean value representing the order type (true for DINE_IN, false for TAKEAWAY).

  • Method Details

    • get_order_id

      public int get_order_id()
      Retrieves the order ID.
      Returns:
      The order ID.

    • beyond_collection_deadline

      public boolean beyond_collection_deadline()
      Checks if the current time is beyond the collection deadline for the order.
      Returns:
      true if the current time is after the collection deadline, false otherwise.

    • DisplayOrder

      public void DisplayOrder()
      Displays the order details including order ID, date and time, items, quantities, and total price.

    • calculatePrice

      public double calculatePrice()
      Calculates the total price of the order based on the item prices and quantities.
      Returns:
      The total price of the order.
